backendErrors.dataSourceNotAccepted: "{{dataSource}}" is not an acceptable value for field dataSource. Accepted values are: {{acceptedDataSources, list}}
backendErrors.routeNotCached: The route for voy {{dataSource}} {{voyName}} is not cached
backendErrors.subscriptionNotFound: Voy {{dataSource}} {{voyName}} for Firebase token {{firebaseToken}} not found
backendErrors.subscriptionAlreadyExists: Voy {{dataSource}} {{voyName}} already exists for Firebase token {{firebaseToken}}

add.title: Add Voy
add.dataSourceHint: Long press on individual data sources for details

sz.name: Spr√°va ≈Ωeleznic (GRAPP)
sz.use: This data source is applicable for all passenger trains on the Czech soil - grapp.spravazeleznic.cz
pros: Works with every train carrier (ƒåD, RJ, LE, Arriva...)
cons: Alerts only at railway stations with dispatchers
Alerts will be around 2-3 minutes delayed
sz.hint: Enter the train number without the train type - 11085

idsok.name: IDSOK (CestujOK)
idsok.use: This data source is applicable for all vehicles in the IDSOK system - cestujok.cz
pros: Based on real-time vehicle position - alerts should arrive on time
cons: Can't be set to alert about arrivals
idsok.hint: Enter the connection name exactly as it appears on CestujOK, without letters - 890302 39, 14018

add.voyConfigHint: Press the Voy from the home screen after adding it to configure it

serverURL.name: Set server URL
serverURL.description: VoyAlert can be set up in a way to use a custom server. This is useful for testing, or if you are self-hosting @voyalert/backend for any reason. If you are not sure what the previous sentence means, it's a wise choice not to touch this setting. Changes won't be saved until "Done" is pressed.
serverURL.ping: The server will be tested by GET /ping

donate.title: Donate to VoyAlert
donate.donateTextPart1: The VoyAlert app and all of its components are completely
donate.donateTextPart2: . I am a high school student and my top priority for this app is for it to feel modern, snappy and easily usable, not to make millions from ads, in-app purchases or from making this a paid app like most big corporations would. In my opinion, donations are the least invasive form of monetization. If you like my work and can afford to donate, a donation would be greatly appreciated. The money received from these donations will be primarily used to keep the backend server running, pay for the yearly charge for a domain name and to cover any other expenses related to VoyAlert. Secondarily, coffee. ‚òï
donate.donationChannelsHint: Click on any channel to copy its address/number
